channel.title: Donator Shop Question
channel.description:
I've added a few items to my donator shop, santa, party hat, sythe, etc, and I would like to increase the amount of donator points that it takes to purchase each of the items, because by default it only costs 1 donator point to purchase them.
Thanks.
